scripts.pdf: npx serve . -p 3033 & echo 'Open http://localhost:3033?print-pdf in Chrome and Print to PDF'
scripts.export-pdf: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx serve . -p 3033" "npx wait-on http://localhost:3033 && npx decktape reveal http://localhost:3033 [workshop-name]-slides.pdf --chrome-arg=--no-sandbox --chrome-arg=--disable-web-security --chrome-arg=--disable-features=VizDisplayCompositor --chrome-arg=--font-render-hinting=none --chrome-arg=--enable-font-antialiasing --chrome-arg=--force-color-profile=srgb --chrome-arg=--disable-gpu --load-pause=3000 --size=1920x1080"
